getGeometryOperation

public static GeometryOperation getGeometryOperation(CoordinateSystem sourceCoordinateSystem,
                                                     CoordinateSystem targetCoordinateSystem)
Return a geometry operation which convert between the source and target coordinate systems. The geometry operation will create a new geometry instead of modifying the existing geometry.

Parameters:
sourceCoordinateSystem - The source coordinate system.
targetCoordinateSystem - The target coordinate system.
Returns:
The geometry operation.

getGeometryOperation

public static GeometryOperation getGeometryOperation(CoordinateSystem cs1,
                                                     CoordinateSystem cs2,
                                                     GeometryFactory geometryFactory)
Return a geometry operation which convert between the source and target coordinate systems. The geometry operation will create a new geometry instead of modifying the existing geometry. All coordinates in the geometry will be made precise using the precision model of the geometry factory.

Parameters:
sourceCoordinateSystem - The source coordinate system.
targetCoordinateSystem - The target coordinate system.
geometryFactory - The geometry factory.
Returns:
The geometry operation.

Return a geometry operation which convert between the source and target coordinate systems. The geometry operation will create a new geometry instead of modifying the existing geometry. All coordinates in the geometry will be made precise using the precision model of the geometry factory.

targetGeometryFactory - The geometry factory.

The geometry operation.
